title: We all fight hard stuff in TFT
body:
But I just fought a rank 3 evelynn with hextech gunblade, Spear of Shojin, and Ludens Echo

It was literally the most disgusting thing I have seen in TFT so far lol

Whats the craziest thing you have fought that just stomped your team into non existence?

EDIT: Personally, I had a Kasadin in a sorc comp that had Phantom Dancer, Dragon's Claw, and Warmog's. Dude COULD NOT die.

replies.body:
3â˜† pyke with sojin, yummi, and arch Angel's.

My enemy's hated playing against it as I was dashing every 1.5 seconds.

I just made other people fight a Shyv with 4 guardian buffs, dragon synergy, and double rageblade with BT.  She legit 1v7ed and won.

Took me 6 games of failing to get that to work, and still only ended up 4th, but at least that battle was pure awesomeness.
